extendedInfo.description: If you are The Police's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check The Police's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all The Police's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of The Police's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Outlandos d'Amour- Reggatta de Blanc- Zenyatta Mondatta- Ghost in the Machine- Synchronicity************************List of lyrics ************************- Be My Girl- Bombs Away- Born In The '50s- Bring On The Night- Canary In A Coalmine- Can't Stand Losing You- Contact- Darkness- De Do Do Do, De Da Da Da- Deathwish- Demolition Man- Does Everyone Stare- Don't Stand So Close To Me- Driven To Tears- Every Breath You Take- Every Little Thing She Does Is Magic- Hole In My Life- Hungry For You (J'Aurais Toujours Faim De Toi)- Invisible Sun- It's Alright For You- King Of Pain- Man In A Suitcase- Message In A Bottle- Miss Gradenko- Mother- Murder By Numbers- Next To You- No Time This Time- O My God- Omegaman- On Any Other Day- One World (Not Three)- Peanuts- Rehumanize Yourself- Roxanne- Sally- Secret Journey- Shadows In The Rain- So Lonely- Spirits In The Material World- Synchronicity I- Synchronicity II- Tea In The Sahara- The Bed's Too Big Without You- Too Much Information- Truth Hits Everybody- Voices Inside My Head- Walking In Your Footsteps- Walking On The Moon- When The World Is Running Down, You Make The Best Of What's Still Around- Wrapped Around Your Finger
